title: Elon Musk’s Twitter Tantrum Needs a Time Out
sub_head: Twitter shares soared Monday after Musk’s stake disclosure, but they will soon find gravity
body:
Elon Musk is paying to change the conversation on Twitter . Investors may pay for his interest.
Twitter’s stock surged 27% Monday after Mr. Musk, Tesla ’s chief executive, disclosed a 9% stake in the company worth about $3 billion, making him the social media platform’s largest shareholder.
